::ShadowWing::

She fined tuned her audio sensors to hear what was being said on the battle 
field.  She heard DIE MAXIMAL, and her talons twitched.  She saw one bot 
fire on another.  She saw one bot throw grenades at two other bots below 
her.

She spread her wings and prepared for battle.

"Blast this goody-goody programming of mine.  This isn't my fight. I can get 
slagged and not know for who or why even."

She sighed, "Well, here's one for the Matrix."

She swooped down from her perch and dive bombed BlastRage.  Her talons 
outstretched and ready to tear through Predacon hide.  She came diving in at 
full speed.

-------Original Message-----------

>Rhinox/Sniper

>Rhinox hears Iron Raptor tell him to get to battle. He looks at her
>dumbfounded. He watches her as she walks away. Rhinox mumbles to
>himself. "How am I to fight with no wepons?" Rhinox looks at Key's CR
>Chamber. "Good she's about to get out. I better get in one." Rhinox
>sees that there is an autogun in the roof. "Autogun, Fire on all
>Non-Maximals when they come through the door." Rhinox open the CR
>Chamber he's about to get in. "Ohhh and if any Non-Maximal does come
>in open up my CR Chamber." Rhinox steps inot the CR Chamber, and
>Starts to heal himself.
>
>
>Sniper looks around for some one to attack. He sees the target, Zeus.
>He pulls out a another rifle and sets it to rapid fire. He runs at
>Zeus firing 50 lasers from his 2 rifles and 3 optic blast.
>~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>BH/BlastRage
>
>
>BH looks at Prowl. "Die Maximal." He fires his 2 Semi-automatics at
>Prowl, producing 50 Lasers and he fired 2 Optic Blast.
>
>BlastRage fire 10x more Gernades at SnowTech and ShadowCat. "Stupid
>maximals, standing together." He fires 5 optic Blast at the base.
>
